body_html: @roozmahdavian you helped fix my issues! I am on a virtualenv with pip on windows 10 64 (no conda or Anaconda). Had to delete numpy (it didn't want to uninstall), install numpy-MKL from your link then import torch worked.
body_text: @roozmahdavian you helped fix my issues! I am on a virtualenv with pip on windows 10 64 (no conda or Anaconda). Had to delete numpy (it didn't want to uninstall), install numpy-MKL from your link then import torch worked.
body: @roozmahdavian you helped fix my issues! I am on a virtualenv with pip on windows 10 64 (no conda or Anaconda). Had to delete numpy (it didn't want to uninstall), install numpy-MKL from your link then `import torch` worked.
